titleStmt.title: Le reveille-matin des Francois, et de leurs voisins. Composé par Eusebe Philadelphe cosmopolite, en forme de dialogues
Dialogi ab Eusebio Philadelpho. French
titleStmt.author: Barnaud, Nicolas, b. 1538 or 9.
Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
Hotman, François, 1524-1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: De l'impremerie de Iaques Iames. Auec permission,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Dialogi ab Eusebio Philadelpho.
Also attributed to Théodore de Bèze and to François Hotman.
The imprint is false; in fact printed abroad (STC).
"Dialogue second du reveille matin des Francois, et de leurs voisins" has separate dated title page, pagination and register.
In this edition, line 10 on p. 7 ends "qu'on"; pt. 2 has errata on p. 192; the 2nd and 3rd errata on p. 152 are corrected.
Identified as STC 1464 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
